Compatibilities levels (COMPAT_LEVEL):

  • JS
  • Mix
  • Python (not implemented - runtime)
FeatureCompat flagDescr
TypeScript output?(do the type checking ?)
Standard error messages?Not supported by default (increase runtime size)
Operations on unknown types?Not supported by default (increase runtime size)
multi-inheritance + //?Requires sb helper
Operations order?We might change op order when needed
Function kw args?Require a JS h4ck
%?Modulo behave differently with negative numbers
str(float)?Python has a slightly different format
__op__ direct call?Not supported by default (increase runtime size)
